name: PAT_REL_ADDR
description: This table extracts the related multiple-response item Pat Rel Address (I EPT 1701) item, which stores the addresses of each emergency contact for a given patient. In this table, each GROUP_LINE value represents a different patient contact, and each VALUE_LINE value represents a different line of that contact's address. You can use PAT_ID and GROUP_LINE to join this table with the PAT_RELATIONSHIPS table.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PAT_REL_ADDRESS
columns.description: Patient emergency contact's address. Here, each GROUP_LINE value represents a different patient contact, and each VALUE_LINE value represents a different line of that contact's address. You can use PAT_ID and GROUP_LINE to join this table with the PAT_RELATIONSHIPS table.
